languages.text: Поставщики наживаются на проблемах Вольного Торговца, повышая цены за срочность доставок, но жители колонии спасены.
Suppliers are taking advantage of the Rogue Trader's desperation by driving up the prices of rush shipments, but the colony's population has been saved.
languages.original_text: Поставщики наживаются на проблемах Вольного Торговца, повышая цены за срочность доставок, но жители колонии спасены.

traits.locale_text: The suppliers are taking advantage of the Rogue Trader's desperation by driving up the prices of rush shipments, but the colony's population has been saved.
The decision costs millions of lives, but mass poisoning is averted.

languages.text: Si les fournisseurs profitent de ce que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} est aux abois pour augmenter le tarif des livraisons d'urgence, la population de la colonie a été sauvée.
languages.original_text: Suppliers are taking advantage of the Rogue Trader's desperation by driving up the prices of rush shipments, but the colony's population has been saved.

traits.locale_text: Si les fournisseurs profitent de ce que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} est aux abois pour augmenter le tarif des livraisons d'urgence, la population de la colonie a été sauvée.

languages.text: 自由開拓者の絶望的な状況につけこんでサプライヤーが緊急輸送の価格を吊り上げているが、コロニーの人々は救われた。
languages.original_text: Suppliers are taking advantage of the Rogue Trader's desperation by driving up the prices of rush shipments, but the colony's population has been saved.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者の絶望的な状況につけこんでサプライヤーが緊急輸送の価格を吊り上げているが、コロニーの人々は救われた。

languages.text: 行商浪人病急投医，众多供应商趁机哄抬货物价格。不过无论怎样，殖民地的人们总算是获救了。
languages.original_text: Suppliers are taking advantage of the Rogue Trader's desperation by driving up the prices of rush shipments, but the colony's population has been saved.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人病急投医，众多供应商趁机哄抬货物价格。不过无论怎样，殖民地的人们总算是获救了。

languages.text: Los proveedores aprovechan la desesperación de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente para subir el precio de los suministros urgentes, pero la población de la colonia se ha salvado.
languages.original_text: Suppliers are taking advantage of the Rogue Trader's desperation by driving up the prices of rush shipments, but the colony's population has been saved.

traits.locale_text: Los proveedores aprovechan la desesperación de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente para subir el precio de los suministros urgentes, pero la población de la colonia se ha salvado.

languages.text: Lieferanten nutzen die Verzweiflung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} aus, indem sie für Eillieferungen deutlich höhere Preise verlangen. Die Bevölkerung der Kolonie ist aber gerettet.
languages.original_text: Suppliers are taking advantage of the Rogue Trader's desperation by driving up the prices of rush shipments, but the colony's population has been saved.

traits.locale_text: Lieferanten nutzen die Verzweiflung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} aus, indem sie für Eillieferungen deutlich höhere Preise verlangen. Die Bevölkerung der Kolonie ist aber gerettet.

languages.text: Tedarikçiler, Hür Tacir'in içine düştüğü zor durumdan nemalanarak acil sevkiyat fiyatlarını artırsa da kolonide yaşayan nüfus kurtarıldı.
languages.original_text: Suppliers are taking advantage of the Rogue Trader's desperation by driving up the prices of rush shipments, but the colony's population has been saved.
